mapper.update:
update bif_device
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_sn = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
catalog_id = #{catalogId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tech_param = #{techParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_usable = #{flagUsable,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_warranty = #{flagWarranty,jdbcType=BIT},
warranty_expire_date = #{warrantyExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
use_expire_date = #{useExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select device.id id, device.device_name deviceName, device.device_sn deviceSn, device.model_id modelId, device.catalog_id catalogId, device.flag_deleted flagDeleted, device.create_time createTime, device.brand brand, device.model, device.tech_param techParam, device.flag_usable flagUsable, device.flag_warranty flagWarranty, device.warranty_expire_date warrantyExpireDate, device.use_expire_date useExpireDate, device.create_person createperson, device.update_time updateTime, device.update_person updatePerson, device.memo memo, model.series_id seriesId, brand.id brandId, (select series.series_name from bif_device_series series where series.id=model.series_id) series from bif_device device LEFT JOIN bif_device_model model on model.id=device.model_id LEFT JOIN bif_device_brand brand on brand.brand_name=device.brand where device.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
